title: April Fools!
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Nyan nyan nyaan~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Mew mew?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Nyaaan~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Mew Mrrowow! Meoow~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Nyauu~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Mew Meow! Maaaorrao!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Alright, we’re all ready now, Rin-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Let’s trick everyone into thinking that we’ve become real cats nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Fufufu, I’m so excited~. Who should we go for first?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>That’s a good question nya~.... Maki-chan!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
